posts._title: Danièle Huillet & Jean-Marie Straub – En rachâchant (1982)
posts.title: En rachâchant
posts.excerpt: En Rachâchant is a 7 minute short film made by the esoteric director duo Jean-Marie Straub and Danièle Huillet. The text is adapted from a children’s story written by Marguerite Duras. It tells the story of a little boy named Ernesto who refuses to go to school because the school teaches things he doesn’t know.
